descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Join Discord: **discord.gg/pdvr** (pixel dungeon vr) to win exclusive rewards🎁

**Exclusive Launch Offer - Pixel Dungeon Supporter Bundle** is available in the Bundle section on this store page. **Players that own the full game can directly purchase the bundle to unlock exclusive avatars and a special nickname tag for $5.**

[media]
Pixel Dungeon is an interactive RPG action adventure dungeon exploration game with captivating pixel art style, offering **4 maps, 6 difficulty levels, 80+ monsters, 4 bosses, 70+ weapons, and 30+ avatars. Game content is continuously updating**. 

# 👐 Solo or Co-op
Solo exploration or 3-player team-up. Co-op multiplayer enhances your social experience with smarter battle strategies and real-time voice chat.
[media]

# 🕌 Endless Dungeons
Explore randomly generated dungeons in the pixel world, offering a new challenge with each epic adventure. 
[media]

# ⚔️ Immersive Combat
Choose, mix and match from 70+ weapons—snipe with crossbow, wield heavy sword, throw axes... and face off against 80+ monsters and 4 epic bosses in a non-stop thrill ride! 
[media]

# 🧝‍♂️ Diverse Avatars
Start with 30 avatars, with more designs to be determined by players. Share your ideas in Discord!

# 🌟 Growth System
- **Talent**: Utilize the talent system to upgrade different abilities, enhance combat prowess, unlock new skills and items.
- **Weapon Crafting**: Forge your own legendary gear by upgrading weapons or rerolling weapon stats.
